name: Snake With Metabolism
description:
What if there was the classic Nokia game Snake, but the snake didn't get longer? Well, if you fit into that strangely specific category, then Snake With Metabolism is the right game for you! You get: a game without an OST, a game that shouldn't exist, and a game where the controls are in a README rather than either here or in the game! And all those games are the same game! 

So, go on and play it I guess idk
